metadata.title: President condoles over Ahmedabad plane crash

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 12 (APP):President Asif Ali Zardari has expressed sorrow over the tragic loss of life in the plane crash that occurred in Ahmedabad, India on Thursday. "Our heartfelt sympathies and condolences are with the families of the victims who have lost their loved ones in the air crash," the President said.
